summary: Website update request for "Fresh Bites 49": globally replace the wording "Ready to Cut" with "Ready to Cook" across all site text while keeping design, pricing, images, layout, cart, and WhatsApp checkout unchanged.
architectural_notes: Do not modify prices, images, layout, cart functionality, or WhatsApp checkout system; only change text from "Ready to Cut" to "Ready to Cook" and keep styling/formatting identical.

existing_features.title: Replace every user-facing occurrence of the exact text "Ready to Cut" with "Ready to Cook" across the entire Fresh Bites 49 frontend, including (but not limited to) section headings, product titles, category labels, and navigation/menu labels.

Update any internal in-app references that surface this label in navigation/scroll targets so the user sees and navigates using "Ready to Cook" consistently (e.g., menu item text and any visible label connected to in-page navigation), while keeping cart behavior and WhatsApp checkout behavior unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Globally replace all occurrences of "Ready to Cut" with "Ready to Cook" across headings, product titles, category labels, and internal references without changing pricing, images, layout, cart, or WhatsApp checkout.
